Taunton.W.C. Beattie House:
The W.C. Beattie House is a historic house located at 289 West Brittania Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The house was built in 1882 for W.C. Beattie, a designer at Reed & Barton. It is among the best extant examples of a large-scale builder-produced Queen Anne residence in the city.
